title: Conversations you've made changes to
content:
Anyone knows what's that circled in blue?

The first screenshot is from phone settings, apps and notifications, the second from WhatsApp info, notifications.

It appeared after I long pressed on a notification from WhatsApp, but then I dismissed and changed nothing.

How can I remove it or reset to default?

Thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4 XL
